feed.title: Interview: Josh Gad Feels the Good Vibes
feed.subtitle: The star of MTV's filthiest animated show on his hectic schedule which includes an NBC pilot, a steady gig on The Daily Show, a film adaptation of Neil Strauss's pick-up bible The Game and a starring role as Elder Cunningham in the Broadway smash The Book of Mormon.

link.title: Interview: Josh Gad Feels the Good Vibes
Interview: Josh Gad Feels the Good Vibes

entry.title: Interview: Josh Gad Feels the Good Vibes

link.Abstract: The star of MTV's filthiest animated show on his hectic schedule which includes an NBC pilot, a steady gig on The Daily Show, a film adaptation of Neil Strauss's pick-up bible The Game and a starring role as Elder Cunningham in the Broadway smash The Book of Mormon.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: At 31, actor Josh Gad is currently starring, creating or producing no less than five projects, including David Gordon Green's animated MTV series Good Vibes, the NBC pilot 1600 Penn, a film adaptation of Neil Strauss's pick-up bible The Game, a steady gig on The Daily Show and a starring role as Elder Cunningham in the Broadway smash The Book of Mormon, for which he just won a Grammy.
link.title: At 31, actor Josh Gad is currently starring, creating or producing no less than five projects, including David Gordon Green's animated MTV series Good Vibes, the NBC pilot 1600 Penn, a film adaptation of Neil Strauss's pick-up bible The Game, a steady gig on The Daily Show and a starring role as Elder Cunningham in the Broadway smash The Book of Mormon, for which he just won a Grammy.

link.Abstract: Friday: There's an adult party on I Just Want My Wants Pack.

link.Abstract: Tuesday, Mar. 6 – New Girl [Fox/Citytv, 9.00 p.m. ET/PT] The gang plays a game of touch football which leave poor Nick with an injury. For some reason, dude doesn't have a doctor so Jess ends up taking him to her OBGYN, because that's how things are done in TV land.
